section.name: Legacy Avalon Products
section.p:
Several Apache Avalon products have been either retired or spun off into their own Apache projects. For a more detailed record of Avalon's evolution, see the
history section.

tr.td: Excalibur included a component library as well as the Excalibur Component Manager (ECM) -- a minimal Avalon container.
Graduated to it's own ASF Project: Apache Excalibur
Fortress is a lightweight Avalon container designed to to be the successor to ECM.
Now part of the Apache Excalibur Project
Avalon Phoenix is an Avalon 4 container designed to be used as an application server framework.
Active development halted. See distribution mirrors for prior releases and documentation. Also, see Codehaus' Loom project, a fork of Phoenix.
LogKit is a full logging framework similar to Log4J.
LogKit is stable and used in many products but not actively developed. Many logkit utilities (ie- Excalibur Logging) are now part of the Apache Excalibur Project.
